page.title: 06THE BRIGHTON CENTRE
page.content: The Brighton Centre is located on the seafront.It is the biggest conference and exhibition centre in the town. It was opened in 1977 costing Â£8.9 million.Between then and 1982,1034 conferences and exhibitions had been held,attracting 185,000 delegates and visitors spending Â£32.4 million in the economy.The average spending of an overseas delegate in 1981 was Â£240_47% on accomodation in 5 star hotels.The Brighton Centre adds Â£10 to the rates of every rate_payer in Brighton per year to finish paying off the cost of building the centre. Also a lot of pop concerts are held at the centre bringing in quite a lot of money to the town.There are already bookings for 1991 including the annual "Party" Conferences.
